description:
GolfLogix: Golf GPS

The #1 App for Golf.

GolfLogix is now available for the Palm Pre. 

Try our new FREE version today!

Get distances to all greens, layups and hazards. 

Keep score for you and your friends, plus track your stats like the pros.

Hundreds of thousands of golfers have relied on the accuracy of GolfLogix maps since 1999 so go with GolfLogix, the proven World Leader in Golf GPS.

See the GolfLogix application featured in nationwide TV commercials with Gary McCord airing daily on The Golf Channel. 

Download it today and get a FREE LIFETIME MEMBERSHIP to GolfLogix.

Use our interactive aerial images to see an overview of each fairway and zoomed-in aerial greens.

Up to 4-person scoring and pro-level stat tracking such as fairways hit, greens in regulation, distance of clubs, putting outcomes, sand saves, and scrambling percentages

Sync and share all your scores and stats in the free online GolfLogix clubhouse.

Free Lifetime Club membership with each new download includes full access to all scoring, stat tracking, viewing aerial images and free personal web pages in the online GolfLogix clubhouse.

Option to upgrade to an annual Champion member at anytime to access precise GPS distance features.  As always all Champion membership features are included for a free 24-hour trial with each new app download.

Gain access to the world’s largest, most accurate, and up-to-date golf course map database with over 25,500+ courses mapped and more added every day.

All software upgrades and updated golf course maps are always included for GolfLogix Members.

Member Support Team ready to help and answer all of your questions.  Call GolfLogix toll-free at 877-977-0162 option 1, Monday-Friday, 7am to 5:30pm MST.  Or, email us anytime at support@golflogix.com.

Find out what makes GolfLogix the world leader in Golf GPS.  Try it today!  Download it for FREE.
